item.title: Why Everyone Should #DeletePython
item.description: Disclaimer: this article reflects my personal opinion only. Reader discretion is advised. How BMO changes batteries (Adventure Time). Cute but dangerous, just like working with Python 2 and 3 simultaneously. OK. There I said it. Everybody should consider #DeletePython. Recently, people have raised significant concerns regarding Facebook’s privacy protection practice on their user’s data, with the discussions on Twitter: #DeleteFacebook. This inspired me to say something about another spicy topic: #DeletePython.
